title: Build a Package Tracker With WhatsApp API
author: Emmanuel Aiyenigba
description: The WhatsApp Business Platform Cloud API paired with Stream Chat gives you a powerful tool for real-time customer support, order tracking and automation.
cntitle: 使用 WhatsApp API 构建一个包裹追踪器
cndescription: WhatsApp Business Platform Cloud API 与 Stream Chat 结合使用，为您提供强大的实时客户支持、订单跟踪和自动化工具。
